verses.kjv: 12 Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.
verses.niv: 12 So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.

verses.esv: 14 The sky vanished like a scroll that is being rolled up, and every mountain and island was removed from its place.
verses.kjv: 14 And the heaven departed as a scroll when it is rolled together; and every mountain and island were moved out of their places.
verses.niv: 14 The sky receded like a scroll, rolling up, and every mountain and island was removed from its place.
